title: #PCIeZone.v0_9_0.PCIeZone

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This object represents the Oem property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.

PortsInZone.description: This is a link to a collection of PCIe upstream ports associated with this PCIe zone.
PortsInZone.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the PCIePort schema.

DeviceFunctionsInZone.description: This is a link to a collection of PCIeFunctions associated with this PCIe zone.
DeviceFunctionsInZone.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the PCIeFunction schema.

Links.description: The links object contains the links to other resources that are related to this resource.

PCIeZone.description: This is the schema definition for the PCIe zone resource.
PCIeZone.longDescription: This is the schema definition for the PCIe zone resource. It represents the properties of a PCIe zone created on the PCIe switch.
